column6:
Lovely Ground Floor Condo, great location in the center of South Padre Island, you can easily walk the half-block to the beach and eateries, shops, and more are all just a short walk away.

My condo has 2 bedroom, 2 bath, sleeps 9 comfortably. WiFi and Cable TV are included. Kitchen has everything necessary to create meals. Parking for two vehicles in one parking space.

Make the Escape #5 your home!

column9: Escape#5 1st Floor, Sleeps 9, Close to Beach, Pool
